alert.note: Alert for Anderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL KNOX AND CENTRAL ANDERSON COUNTIES... At 421 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clinton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Oak Ridge, Clinton, Oliver Springs, Plainview, Halls, Maloneyville, Powell and Karns. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 385 and 396. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 108 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
